description: APOYO A LA GESTION DEL INPE

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: Implementar una política penitenciaria con miras a la reeducación, rehabilitación y reincorporación prograsiva del interno a la sociedad.
subproject.title: Apoyo a la Gestión del INPE
